column1: Table 10. Number of inmates held in custody of state prisons, as a percent of capacity, 1995 and 2000-2008
Authors: William J. Sabol, Ph.D., Heather C. West, Ph.D., and Matthew Cooper
Table 10: Number of inmates held in custody of state prisons, as a percent of capacity, 1995 and 2000-2008
Note: Capacity excludes prisoners held in local jails and in privately operated facilities, with exceptions. See NPS jurisdiction notes.
